name: reclapp-e-commerce
description: E-Commerce Example - Full platform with products, orders, inventory

scripts.generate: cd ../.. && npx ts-node generator/cli.ts generate examples/e-commerce/contracts/main.reclapp -o examples/e-commerce/src -t full-stack
scripts.dev: npm run generate && cd src && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run generate && cd src && npm run build
